description: Enables the management of privileged root user credentials across member accounts in your organization. When you enable root credentials management for centralized root access, the management account and the delegated administrator for IAM can manage root user credentials for member accounts in your organization. Before you enable centralized root access, you must have an account configured with the following settings:

nested_items.name: OrganizationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of an organization.

nested_items.name: EnabledFeatures
nested_items.description: The features you have enabled for centralized root access.
